body: "We must fight to protect Assange," writes Robert Meeropol, the son of Julius and Ethel Rosenberg, executed in 1953 for "Conspiracy to Commit Espionage" in the United States (via Democracy Now).
original_body: "We must fight to protect Assange," writes Robert Meeropol, the son of Julius and Ethel Rosenberg, executed in 1953 for "Conspiracy to Commit Espionage" in the United States (via Democracy Now).
title: USA: Son of Couple Executed in 1953 Defends Wikileaks' Assange
